title: Diamond Bonus Week!
subTitle: Collect Specific Gifts, Get Bonus Diamonds!
rewardDesc: Collect the above gifts, and try to hit the milestone to win a Diamond bonus!
bossDesc:
Top 1 Gift Earner (of each gift)
gets extra 10% diamonds;
max 1 million diamonds.
noteRewardDesc: 2 tiers per gift, maximum 1 redemption per tier
noteBoosDesc1: During the event, broadcasters are ranked in  3 gift categories
noteBoosDesc2: broadcasters who earn the most gifts in 3 categories.
noteBoosDesc3:
Reward: 10% of the diamond bonus
(maximum 1 million)
note1: All bonus diamonds will be issued within ten workdays.
note2: During the event, broadcasters who violate the Live.me Terms of Service lose their eligibility to participate and win a prize.
downloadTip: Download Live.me to watch live video streamings.
wechatTip: Click on the upper right corner, select in the browser to open, and then download our App
